title: How do I add ".co.uk" to my options when typing in email/urls?
content:
When typing in an email/url you can hold down "." and it gives you options for ending the email/url but it does not have the option ".co.uk"
I send emails to people who have the ".co.uk" ending and have to type this in myself and just wondered whether there is a way I can add that to the options already there. 
This is especially an issue when I am typing in my email address as I do not use a gmail account but I use a "hotmail.co.uk" account and this is not suggested when a website asks for an email and then is even longer to type in manually. 
Any help appreciated! Thanks in advance
